text: Margaret "Jane" Pauley (born October 31, 1950) is a news anchor and reporter. She hosted NBC Today between 1976 and 1989 and Dateline NBC starting in 1992 and ending in 2003. Pauley was born in Indianapolis. == Other websites == * * Ubben Lecture at DePauw University on April 17, 2009 * Lawsuit filed against The New York Times and DeWitt Publishing * Jane Pauley Named 2007 Winner of Cronkite Award * == References == Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:People from Indianapolis Category:Journalists from Indiana Category:American television presenters
title: Jane Pauley
